about: Driven and detail-oriented UI Developer with 3+ years of experience in designing and implementing user-centric web applications. Proficient in utilizing React.js and Redux to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Strong foundation in data structures and algorithms, coupled with hands-on experience in Java, enabling the development of robust and efficient backend systems. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.
